headline: Bill Nygren Isn’t Worried About Market Volatility. He Likes GM, Delta, and Capital One Stocks.
summary: Bill Nygren isn’t worried about the recent market volatility. The  manager and chief investment officer of the U.S. for Harris Oakmark thinks now is still a great time to be hunting for value stocks.  “The last two weeks haven’t changed things,” Nygren said Thursday at a media breakfast in New York for Oakmark’s parent company, Natixis Investment Managers, referring to the market’s recent pullback, which accelerated Thursday despite strong earnings from  Nvidia  “We look for names that have been left behind.”  Along those lines, Nygren said there are numerous stocks in the  trading for below 15 times earnings estimates.

headline: Hyundai showcases off-road ambitions with new rugged concept SUV
summary: Hyundai has ambitions to increase the off-road capabilities of its vehicles in the U.S., based on a new "Crater" SUV concept revealed Thursday by the automaker.
